name: Chat Room One (Ludum Dare 37)
description:
NOTE: Sorry, but the server for this game is no longer online. I had kept this running from Ludum Dare 37 (December 2016) until now (May 2018).

Chat Room One is a multiplayer cooperative game.

Escape with the help of a stranger.

Instructions:

Only one button will let you escape the room. Use the computer to talk to another player and help each other escape. If there is no one online, ask a friend to download the game - you'll automatically be matched together.

Escaping a room will give you 1 point, but pressing the wrong button will reset your score to zero. Be careful!

  • Press SPACE to interact.
  • Press ARROW KEYS to move.

This game was made in under 2 days for Ludum Dare 37.
